abstract.t: This document improves and extends the SIP Servlet API defined in [2]. The SIP Servlet API defines a mechanism, which enables the encapsulation of service logic in so called SIP Servlets on the top of the protocol stack of a SIP Server. A very important point, which is not treated by [2] is the interoperability of services. [3] proposes a first approach to overcome this problem with a so called root servlet. In this Internet draft we define a more generic model to perform a combination or interaction of SIP Servlets. This makes the servlet approach to a very powerful alternative also in UMTS to connect SIP Proxy and Service Logic.
